responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "7FE87AA247C9E2364B34FAB8C9402C01", "\"I have been betrayed. The Gaffers have betrayed me as their false god reveals his power of manipulation is why they even exist. This Volton creature has forced me to alter the sphere to allow him to travel to his beginings in hopes of destroying the portals and never allowing the exalted races to return. I enter this last message under their noses hoping it will reach someone who can champion Verra and stop the djinn before he reclaims his power.\"")
name: MIDD_0015_BFP_ClockworkCodex_8
